# o7-util
O7 Python library of useful &amp; common modules


## Dev Notes

```bash
# lint code
pylint src

# Reformat to Black
black src

# check if format is black
black --check src

```

## Regenerate requirements.txt
``` bash
pip install pip-tools
pip-compile pyproject.toml
```
